==========
Changelog
==========
.. changelog::
    :version: 0.9.4

    .. change::
      :tags: general

      Add requirements for main SQLAlchemy test suite, fix problems
      found when running full suite and add support for recent
      SQL Layer features.

    :version: 0.9.3

    .. change::
      :tags: general

      Do not import in setup.py.

    :version: 0.9.2

    .. change::
      :tags: general

      Fix packaging for installation via PyPI.

    :version: 0.9.1

    .. change::
      :tags: general

      Minor fixes, support for SQL Layer 2.0.0.

    :version: 0.9.0

    .. change::
      :tags: general

      Initial release.
